Title: Another Cinderella Story
Writer: Erik Patterson, Jessica Scott, Leigh Dunlap (characters)
Actors: Selena Gomez, Drew Seeley, Jane Lynch, Katharine Isabelle
Plot: A guy who danced with what could be the girl of his dreams at a valentine mascarade ball only has one hint at her identity: the Zune she left behind as she rushed home in order to make her curfew. And with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in front of him, he sets out to find his masked beauty.
